comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printer, Scanner, Copier, similar to the Epson Stylus RX500. See that entry for more info.

The printing engine of this device is most probably the same as of the Epson Stylus Photo R300, for which basic support is available in Gimp-Print 5.0.x. Fine tuning, testing, and support for printing on CDs still has to be done.

Consumables/Refills: 6 separately exchangeable ink cartridges
